{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = <!-- tagline --> |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none -->
|brand = TP-LINK |model = Archer T4 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = U Plus |revision = V1 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = September 29, 2021 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/TP-LINK_Archer_T4U_Plus |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |wlclass = AC1300 |series = <!-- Device series --> |if = USB |if_bus_version = 3.0 |ifconnector = <!-- Interface Connector Type, Leave blank for none --> |formfactor = <!-- Connector Form Factor, Leave blank for none -->
|vendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |device_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subvendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subdevice_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = TE7T4UPLUS |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = <!-- OUI --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown -->
|chip1 = Realtek;RTL8812BU; |chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |txchains = 2 |rxchains = 2 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |acqam = <!-- AC-qam --> |802.11ac = 867 |nqam = 400 |802.11n = 300 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->
|linuxdriv = |windriv =
|is_manuf = <!-- Yes, or No, --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |flags = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac |accessible_UART = |accessible_JTAG = |category =
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 09/27/2020 |estreldate = 10/01/2020 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B08KHV7H1S |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== *Super-Fast WiFi: AC1300 wireless speeds to meet all your gaming, downloading, and streaming needs *Dual Band USB WiFi Dongle: 2.4GHz and 5GHz bands for flexible connectivity (400Mpbs on the 2.4GHz band and 867Mbps on the 5GHz band) *Dual High-Gain Antennas: Improved range, signal quality and transmission performance, ideal USB wifi adapter for desktop pc *MU-MIMO: Delivers highly efficient wireless connection, perfect for busy networks *Wireless USB Wifi Adapter with Super Speed USB 3.0 Port: Up to 10x faster transfer speeds than USB 2.0 *Adjustable, Multi-Directional Antenna: Enable flexible deployment for the best reception with adjustable antennas and flexible desktop design *Compatible with Windows 11/10/8.1/8/7 and macOS X 10.9 - 10.14
==See also== :;[[TP-LINK Archer T series]] â€¢ [[TP-LINK]] *[[TP-LINK Archer T4U]] v1 - AC1200 Wireless Dual Band USB 3.0 Adapter *[[TP-LINK Archer T4U v2]] - AC1300 Wireless Dual Band USB 3.0 Adapter *[[TP-LINK Archer T4U v3]] - AC1300 High Gain Wireless MU-MIMO USB Adapter :FCC ID: TE7T4UV3 (02/08/2018) *[[TP-LINK Archer T4U v3.2]] (v3.20) - AC1300 High Gain Wireless USB Adapter :FCC ID: TE7T4UV32 (03/20/2020) *[[TP-LINK Archer T4U+]] (Plus v1) - AC1300 High Gain Wireless USB Adapter :FCC ID: TE7T4UPLUS (09/27/2020) *[[TP-LINK Archer T3U+]] (Plus v1) - [[Realtek]] RTL8822BU [2357:0138] *[[TP-LINK Archer T3U]] (v1) - [[Realtek]] RTL8812BU [2357:012d]
